message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $12,000. I believe this price reflects its high value and quality, while also providing you with a significant benefit compared to its worth of $15,000. I look forward to your response.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate your product, $12,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'd be willing to pay $10,000 for it. This would still give you a good profit margin, and it's within my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet within my desired price range. To continue our negotiation, I propose a price of $11,000 for the product. I believe this strikes a balance between value and affordability, while still ensuring a reasonable profit for me. I look forward to your thoughts on this proposal.
